contents.Text: Select multiple tables to combine them in the viewport/(Select values).
[[[strong:Tip:]]] You can use [[[strong:SHIFT + LEFT-CLICK]]] on the tables, then scroll down hold [[[strong:SHIFT + LEFT-CLICK]]] again to select all tables in between.
Shows the status of the [[[strong:Multi-Table Mode]]] and the stats of the selected tables.
This includes the number of [[[strong:tables combined]]] and the total amount of [[[strong:rows]]] in the [[[strong:viewport/(Select values)]]]

It also includes some of the table names that are combined and a [[[strong:clear button]]] to clear selected options. (You can use the [[[strong:Multi-Table Mode]]] toggle/icon to return to [[[strong:single-table]]] mode)
This shows in the [[[strong:Name]]] column the [[[strong:table]]] its from in blue and the [[[strong:name]]] of the song in white.
